import React, { useState } from 'react'; import BMIIndicator from './BMIIndicator'; import { WeightTrendChart, BMIBodyFatChart, BodyCompositionChart } from './Charts'; type TimePeriod = 'day' | 'week' | 'month'; const WeightMetrics: React.FC = () => { const [activePeriod, setActivePeriod] = useState('week'); const [activeChart, setActiveChart] = useState<'trend' | 'bmi-fat' | 'composition'>('trend'); return (

🧍‍♂️ Weight & Body Metrics

{/* Chart Type Selector */}
{/* Dynamic Chart Display */}
{activeChart === 'trend' && ( <>
Weight (kg) Goal (65 kg)
)} {activeChart === 'bmi-fat' && ( <>
BMI Body Fat %
)} {activeChart === 'composition' && ( <>
Body Fat (18.2%) Lean Mass (81.8%)
)}

); }; export default WeightMetrics;
